questionListItems.title: Who should I contact if I need further assistance?

topics.title: Who should I contact if I need further assistance?

answer.body:
The self-serve portal seeks to provide a faster way for you to apply for financial assistance online.


As part of the application, we would require you to fill in the following details:

  • Personal Information

  • Family / Next-of-kin living with you information


And for you to upload the following documents to help expedite the application:

  • Latest bank statements for you and your spouse's accounts

  • Latest payslips/CPF/IRAS statements for you and family

  • Any other supporting financial documents


Upon submission, our staff will review your application and may contact you for further information. Please attend your appointment as scheduled regardless of whether you hear from us or not - unless specifically told not to.

questionListItems.title: What happens after I submit my application?

answer.body:
Our staff will review the information you have submitted, identify the most suitable scheme to apply for and assist you further.


We may contact you for further information, but please attend your appointment as scheduled regardless of whether you hear from us or not - unless specifically told not to.

topics.title: What happens after I submit my application?

answer.body:
To apply for financial assistance, you must:

  • be a subsidised patient;

  • have received or require treatment from a Public Health Institution; and

  • be having difficulties paying for your healthcare bills after Government subsidies and other means including MediShield Life, MediSave, and cash.


Your application will be assessed holistically, taking into consideration you and your familyâ€™s financial, health and social circumstances.

questionListItems.title: How will my information be used?

answer.body: The information retrieved will solely be used for evaluating your financial assistance application and will not be circulated.
